JobFullDesc:
The company:
At Datadog, we’re on a mission to build the best monitoring platform in the world. We operate at high scale—trillions of data points per day—providing always-on alerting, metrics visualization, logs, and application tracing for tens of thousands of companies. Our engineering culture values pragmatism, honesty, and simplicity to solve hard problems the right way.
 
The opportunity:
At Datadog, our customers come first. In this role, you will work cross-functionally to determine how our users interact with our products. You will break down complex problems into steps that drive product development at speed.
As a PM working on our core Platform, you will analyze our existing products, look across a variety of goals and potential directions, and set the vision for how our customers use Datadog.
 
You will:

Learn everything about monitoring (theory, applications, best practices) and pour it back into building a great product.
Identify customers' needs and opportunities through data analysis, interviews, and research through quantitative and qualitative methods.
Define and lead the vision and strategy to drive business through new initiatives.
You will routinely interact with customers’ business, product and engineering teams to deeply understand their needs, and translate those into business cases, features, product requirements and roadmaps.
You will manage multiple parallel projects and iterations alongside engineering, and ensure the delivery of feature releases.
Work with marketing and customer success teams to evangelize new features and services that are easy to use and understand.
Communicate feature releases to internal and external users.

 
Requirements:

A technical degree or equivalent experience
You have experience with hands-on software development.
You are a master at prioritization
You love to serve customers, internal and external
